BR_text.BRdescription:
turicreate/src/python/turicreate/_sys_util.py
 
 
          Line 76
       in
       4a8bbf9
 
 
 
 
 
 
  env['LC_ALL']='C' 
 
 
 
 
 
 RuntimeError: Click will abort further execution because Python 3 was configured to use ASCII as encoding for the environment. Consult <denchmark-link:https://click.palletsprojects.com/en/7.x/python3/>https://click.palletsprojects.com/en/7.x/python3/</denchmark-link>
  for mitigation steps.
 This system supports the C.UTF-8 locale which is recommended.
 You might be able to resolve your issue by exporting the
 following environment variables:
 <denchmark-code>export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8
 export LANG=C.UTF-8
 </denchmark-code>

comments_1.comment_text: We should just remove that line and make sure all the tests pass.  I believe that was a workaround for something that is no longer an issue.
